action.action-desc: Mr. Buchanan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To make daylight savings time permanent, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Sunshine Protection Act of 2021.

subsection.header: Repeal of temporary period for daylight savings time
subsection.text: Section 3 of the Uniform Time Act of 1966 (15 U.S.C. 260a) is hereby repealed.

paragraph.text: The second sentence of subsection (a) of section 1 of the Act of March 19, 1918 (commonly known as the Calder Act) (15 U.S.C. 261), is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking 4 hours and inserting 3 hours;
by striking 5 hours and inserting 4 hours;
by striking 6 hours and inserting 5 hours;
by striking 7 hours and inserting 6 hours;
by striking 8 hours and inserting by 7 hours;
by striking 9 hours and inserting 8 hours;
by striking 10 hours; and inserting 9 hours;;
by striking 11 hours and inserting 10 hours; and
by striking 10 hours. and inserting 11 hours..

paragraph.text: Such section is further amended by—

subsection.header: Standard time for certain States and areas
subsection.text: The standard time for a State that has exempted itself from the provisions of section 3(a) of the Uniform Time Act of 1966 (15 U.S.C. 260a(a)), as in effect on the day before the date of the enactment of the Sunshine Protection Act of 2021, pursuant to such section, or an area of a State that has exempted such area from such provisions pursuant to such section, shall be, as such State considers appropriate—

paragraph.text: the standard time for such State or area, as the case may be, pursuant to subsection (a) of this section; or

the standard time for such State or area, as the case may be, pursuant to subsection (a) of this section as it was in effect on the day before the date of the enactment of the Sunshine Protection Act of 2021.

Such section is further amended, in the second sentence of subsection (a), by striking Except as provided in section 3(a) of the Uniform Time Act of 1966 (15 U.S.C. 260a), and inserting Except as provided in subsection (b),.
